message:
https://www.cloudflare.com/terms/
...including, but not limited to, causing (whether directly or indirectly) traffic for your Cloudflare-proxied domain to be sent to an IP address that was not assigned by Cloudflare for the domain;
use the Services to provide a virtual private network or other similar proxy services.
大快人心，早就看滥用workers和saas的不爽了
title: cf更新了服务条款，明文禁止了自选和搭梯
